event.name: DONOR_MANTIS_CHASE
event.text: You are immediately hailed by an impressive looking Mantis ship, "Your ship would make a mighty fine prize. Prepare for battle!"

escape.text: You pick up more chatter from the enemy ship, "You know what... Forget this. Prepare for retreat!" Looks like they're preparing to make a hasty get away!

gotaway.text: The ship made an emergency FTL jump, but it looks like they didn't mask their signatures. You could easily follow them if you want.

event.text: You input their coordinates into your map and prepare to follow.
They're not worth the trouble. You prepare to leave.

destroyed.text: Their ship breaks apart and you move in to scrap the remains.

deadCrew.text: With no more crew on board you are free to salvage what you can from the remains.

event.name: DONOR_MANTIS_CHASE2
event.text: You catch up with the Mantis ship that escaped before, only to see them transferring their crew into an even bigger ship!

escape.text: They appear to be trying to get away again. You doubt they'll forget to mask their jump signature this time.

gotaway.text: Looks like they got away. At least you're able to scrap their abandoned fighter.

surrender.text: "Look, you proved your point. We don't want to die... Take this and let us go. Please?"

event.text: "Thank you. But do you have any idea how much repairing TWO ships will set us back?..." What an odd Mantis. You prepare to leave.
"No! Hurry up, get us out of here! They're crazy!" You cut transmissions.

destroyed.text: Their ship breaks apart and you salvage the two ships.

deadCrew.text: You find an intact weapon on their now empty ship. You take as much scrap from the ships as possible.

event.text: "Not YOU again! Do you know how much these repairs are going to cost me? Time to take out the big guns."
